content: sl1 row 5 p3 pm k2 pm p3 row 25 ws p3 slm knit to m slm p3 row 6 sl1 k2 slm m1l knit to m m1r slm k2 sl1 row 26 sl1 k2 slm k2tog yo ssk slm k2 sl1 row 7 p3 slm knit to m slm p3 row 27 p3 slm k1 kfb into yo k1 slm p3 row 8 sl1 k2 slm knit to m slm k2 sl1 row 28 sl1 k2 slm knit to m slm k2 sl1 row 9 p3 slm knit to m slm p3 row 29 p3 slm knit to m slm p3 10 sts now on needles repeat row 8-9 until work measures 2 in / 5 cm button continue for both versions version or 6 in / 15 cm tie version from co edge ending after a ws row row 30 rs sl1 k2 slm ssk knit to 2 sts before m k2tog slm k2 sl1 row 10 rs sl1 k2 slm m1l knit to m m1r slm k2 sl1 row 31 ws p3 knit to m p3 removing markers row 11 ws p3 slm knit to m slm p3 row 32 sl1 k1 ssk k2tog k1 sl1 row 12 sl1 k2 slm knit to m slm k2 sl1 row 33 purl to end row 13 p3 slm knit to m slm p3 row 34 sl1 ssk k2tog sl1 row 14 sl1 k2 slm knit to m slm k2 sl1 bind off all sts purlwise row 15 p3 slm knit to m slm p3 repeat these six row 8 more times finishing 28 sts now on needles weave in ends and block row 16 rs sl1 k2 slm knit to m slm k2 sl1 button version row 17 ws p3 slm knit to m slm p3 try on headband to determine your preferred button repeat these two row until work measures 14 in / 35 5 cm placement and sew on button we used a ⅝ in / 1 5875 button version or 18 in / 45 5 cm tie version from co cm button for our version edge row 18 rs sl1 k2 slm ssk knit to 2 sts before m k2tog slm k2 sl1 row 19 ws p3 slm knit to m slm p3 row 20 sl1 k2 slm knit to m slm k2 sl1 row 21 p3 slm knit to m slm p3 row 22 sl1 k2 slm knit to m slm k2 sl1 row 23 p3 slm knit to m slm p3 repeat these six row 8 more times 10 sts now on needles www toltyarnandwool com 3 all text images and illustration © tolt yarn and wool 2019 rubybeach_ v1 0 www toltyarnandwool com 4 all text images and illustration © tolt yarn and wool 2019
